viber.User¶

class viber.User(id, name=None, avatar=None, country=None, language=None, role=None, api_version=None, bot=None)¶

Bases: viber.base.ViberObject

This object represents a Viber user.

id¶

Unique identifier for this user.

Type:int
name¶

Optional. User’s name.

Type:bool
avatar¶

Optional. User’s avatar URL.

Type:str
country¶

Optional. User’s country code.

Type:str
language¶

Optional. User’s language code..

Type:str
role¶

Optional. User’s role in bot, present when getting members of bot.

Type:viber.enums.UserRole
api_version¶

Optional. Minimal api version.

Type:str
bot¶

Optional. The Bot to use for instance methods.

Type:viber.Bot
Parameters:
  • id (int) – Unique identifier for this user.
  • bot (viber.Bot, optional) – The Bot to use for instance methods.
classmethod from_dict(data, bot)¶
